The only recent case of necrophilia was found in Frankfort, Illinois. Disgruntled school student, Brian Burke, angry because the bulliess at school made fun of his glasses, dug up his grandfathers grave, preceeding to lick the corpse's anus, and perform [[fellatio]] on the corpse's penis. The sick, sad, depressed child commited suicide shortly after molesting his grandfather's corpse by cutting off his penis with a rusty butterknife and ramming it down his throat, all while jamming a broomstick up his ass.
